Articles.Content: Ah, thanks!
Which will be fixed when we roll out the next version with new 'stuff'.
...which, I can assure you (K-A-K), are highly anticipated.
I too have explained this problem a number of times, and also what I intend to do about it.
I like this pack. 8)
Would you please tell me what the name of the 3d program you are working with. My first guess is Blender.

Would you please tell me what the name of the 3d program you are working with. My first guess is Blender.

3DS Max 2012.

3DS Max 2012.

Me to! But your models are so low poly.

The shuttle doesn\'t look low-poly.

Plus most parts aren\'t exactly made for sheer eyecandy to begin with.

Me to! But your models are so low poly.

Because they don\'t wanna make your computer cry when playing KSP.
KSP has a pretty harsh limit on polycount anyway (per part)

KSP has a pretty harsh limit on polycount anyway (per part)

what is the limit per part?

dunno exactly, its something between 15 and 20k

That N1-ish engine I made with the 19 nozzles wouldnt work until I stripped all detail off the individual bells
It appears that the PLF and LEM downloads are not functioning correctly, each time i try to open the downloaded files, computer says that the zip file is corrupted...
Just wanted to let you guys know, your multiupload links are down, likely because of the demise of Megaupload.

Just wanted to let you guys know, your multiupload links are down, likely because of the demise of Megaupload.

Oh that\'s just the LEM which is broken at the moment anyway.

I must get round to fixing that.

Are you insist on doing mentioned orion-like and MSL-like parts?
I fixed the LEM, if anyone is interested.

I fixed the LEM, if anyone is interested.

didn\'t even know it was broken, but a big thank you. :3

didn\'t even know it was broken, but a big thank you. :3

It was if you were running the latest version of KSP.

So I\'m having an issue with loading the LEM .craft file. When I load it up, it shows up in the VAB for a moment or so, and then it goes right back to the capsule select screen.

I can build the LEM normally and it works fine (although the decoupler under the capsule is a bit tricky)

Anyway, just thought I\'d put this up here in case other people are having the same problem.

This is with 13.2 (fixed version), and the only add-ons installed are the three from this thread, that were downloaded last night.

Also, GREAT WORK! Keep it up!

Mediafire doesn\'t have viruses. And Avast is a POS.

1) I have avast, and it didn\'t complain.

2) Avast is one of the best AV systems you can get.

So I\'m having an issue with loading the LEM .craft file. When I load it up, it shows up in the VAB for a moment or so, and then it goes right back to the capsule select screen.

I can build the LEM normally and it works fine (although the decoupler under the capsule is a bit tricky)

Anyway, just thought I\'d put this up here in case other people are having the same problem.

This is with 13.2 (fixed version), and the only add-ons installed are the three from this thread, that were downloaded last night.

Also, GREAT WORK! Keep it up!

go to the craft file and check that the version number is 13.2. If it isn\'t you can just edit it in notepad. Hopefully this is the source of your problem
